ThingDef.label: Sleeping Spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable.

ThingDef.Label: Hay bed
ThingDef.Description: A makeshift bed, made of hay and small branches. Just a step above sleeping on the ground.

ThingDef.Label: Hide bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple bed for sleeping in. Not very comfortable, however.

ThingDef.Label: Hide bed double
ThingDef.Description: A large makeshift bed, makes you feel like you're in the stone age. Fits two.

ThingDef.label: Basic Bed
ThingDef.Description: A very basic mattress with sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: Simple Bed
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress with sheets on a metal frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: Fancy Bed
ThingDef.Description: A soft bedding provides a comfortable resting place for sleepy colonists.

ThingDef.Name: LuxuryBedBase
ThingDef.Description: The luxury bed is the ultimate bed in terms of comfort. This is a bed fit for royalty.

ThingDef.label: Double bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Double Bed (Red)
ThingDef.Description: The only thing better than a luxury bed is one twice the size! You don't even have to share it with anyone! All that extra sleeping room provides a bit more comfort. This one comes with fancy red sheets.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Double Bed (Green)
ThingDef.Description: The only thing better than a luxury bed is one twice the size! You don't even have to share it with anyone! All that extra sleeping room provides a bit more comfort. This one comes with snazzy green sheets.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Double Bed (Blue)
ThingDef.Description: The only thing better than a luxury bed is one twice the size! You don't even have to share it with anyone! All that extra sleeping room provides a bit more comfort. This one comes with voluptuous blue sheets.

ThingDef.label: Pod Bed
ThingDef.Description: A futuristic bed with high rest effectiveness.

ThingDef.label: Hospital Bed
ThingDef.Description: A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Hospital Bed
ThingDef.Description: An advanced bed specially designed to treat injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work even more than the hospital bed.

ThingDef.label: Animal Sleeping Spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.

ThingDef.label: Animal hay sleeping spot
ThingDef.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits small animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: Animal Sleeping Box
ThingDef.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: Animal Bed
ThingDef.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: Stone Stool
ThingDef.description: Primitive stone stool.

ThingDef.label: Wooden Stool
ThingDef.description: Primitive wooden stool.

ThingDef.label: Backless Stool
ThingDef.description: A very basic platform on which to sit. It lacks a backrest.

ThingDef.label: Stool
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit. A round seat makes it a little more comfortable than the square backless stool.

ThingDef.label: Bench
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit.

ThingDef.label: Dining Chair
ThingDef.description: A sturdy and attractive chair that is typically used for sitting at a table. It is a proper seating improvement over stools.

ThingDef.label: Armchair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft and comfy seat. Great for relaxation. Whoever thought of adding soft padding to a chair is a genious.

ThingDef.label: Couch
ThingDef.Description: A couch is the ultimate furniture piece for sitting satisfaction. Relaxing on it won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

ThingDef.label: Couch
ThingDef.description: A couch is type of furniture that could be suitable for two, but is usable by only one. It won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

ThingDef.label: Holographical Cell
ThingDef.description: Enter to galahoo, himself ! It need a human ?

ThingDef.label: Table (Short)
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This short table is suitable for 4 at once.

ThingDef.label: Table (Long)
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This long table is suitable for 8 at once.

ThingDef.label: Glass Table
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This tiny glass table is suitable for 1.

ThingDef.label: Clothing locker
ThingDef.Description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker. It comes with dust contractor unit for that good, ancient feeling.

ThingDef.label: Cabinet
ThingDef.Description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker.

ThingDef.label: Locker
ThingDef.Description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker. It comes with dust contractor unit for that good, ancient feeling.

ThingDef.label: Commode
ThingDef.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly.

ThingDef.label: Barber Bench
ThingDef.Description: Place where hair go wild!

ThingDef.label: Dressing Table
ThingDef.description: A Dresser to make Pawns look more snappy.

ThingDef.label: Bookcase
ThingDef.description: A bookcase with a wide variety of books.

ThingDef.label: End Table
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly.

ThingDef.label: End Table with Lamp
ThingDef.description: A small table with a lamp and a drawer. It would be a nice addition beside a bed. Uses 20 W to light a small area.

ThingDef.label: Journal Table
ThingDef.description: A decorative table with a journal on it. Colonists can gather here to discuss the majestic journal and the mighty steed that is the table that it rests upon.
